```{r}
library(Seurat)
```

```{r}
PRAD_TvsN <- readRDS(data/PRAD_TvsN)
```

Combine into on data.frame
```{r}
tumor <- PRAD_TvsN$tumor
```

```{r}
pca_tumor <- Seurat::RunPCA(t(tumor))
```

Analysis of variance
```{r}
variance = (pca_tumor@stdev)^2 ##Eigenvalues

barplot(log(variance), main = "log(variance) after pca for tumor samples of PRAD dataset", xlab = "PC_i", ylab = "log(variance)")
```

Scaling on 1 gives proportion of variance in percent
```{r}
prop.var = variance/pca_tumor@misc$total.variance

summary(prop.var)

barplot(prop.var)
```
